name: Bloody Boobs
description:
Imagine that you are a young beautiful girl with a tasty body, and it can mean only one thing – you’re perfect for… Human sacrifice for an ancient god! Try to get out of the labyrinth with a help of your teammates. Avoid traps that awaits you on your path. Banish a devilish creature back to where it came from.

Key features:
- The atmosphere of a bygone era of horror movies of 60's - 80's.
- Gameplay based on stealth
- Realistic physics of women's breasts and butt
- Character customisation
- Partially random generation of the labyrinth
- Also girls in tight swimming suits, blood, screams and a lot more...
